response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its quality and uniqueness. Considering its immense worth to you, I propose a special offer to make this acquisition more accessible. Would you be interested in purchasing the product for $950,000? This offer represents a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value and my desired sale price, aiming to satisfy both our interests.", "product_price": 950000}
